posts.post_content:
it doesn't straight up improve your hand. it filters, but you have one less card in hand after it resolves than you did before.  
  
still completely broken though.

posts.post_content:
https://www.wizards.com/Magic/Magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtg/daily/feature/109a  
No longer restricted in vintage. I guess the format's too fast for 3 lands to end up on the battlefield and make a difference. Maybe it will find its way into Mana drain control decks to provide even more hand sculpting, drawing what you top/brainstorm/jaced, and untapping Tolarian Academy. Other aggressive decks need the card advantage and would rather prefer the more reliable dark ritual.  
Legacy - now that's where this card would cause havoc
posts.html:
https://www.wizards.com/Magic/Magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtg/daily/feature/109a
